Detailed Description

printf (subset) implementation for the node.

Author:
Adam Torgerson
Date:
12/12/2003
This is a subset of printf used for debugging on the node. Minimum field width and zero-padding are available for numeric types.

Note: There are a few stipulations with using our version of printf over the normal system printf.

use %C for 8-bit numbers
use %d for 16-bit numbers
use %l for 32-bit numbers
use %c for characters
use %s for strings
use %b for binary
use %h for hexadecimal

Definition in file printf.h.
